device_type.description: Select the device type to configure

reload_confirm.description:
You've changed the update frequency for {device} from {old_value} to {new_value} seconds.

What this means:
• All entities from this device will poll at the new frequency
• Lower values = more frequent updates but more network traffic
• Higher values = less frequent updates but reduced network load

For the new frequency to take effect, the integration must be reloaded. This will temporarily disconnect all entities while the integration restarts (typically just a few seconds).

How would you like to proceed?
reload_confirm.title: Update Frequency Changed - Reload Required
